.. content:

***************
GLOFRIM content
***************

GLOFRIM can be downloaded from `GitHub <https://github.com/openearth/glofrim>`_ including the following content:

#. GLOFRIM code
#. PCR-GLOBWB with BMI adapter

GLOFRIM code
============

This is the core of GLOFRIM.

PCR-GLOBWB
==========

The provided model version is 2.0.3 and contains most features of the default PCR-GLOBWB model.

.. warning::

    Due to the evolving nature of model code and thus also of PCR-GLOBWB, recently added functionality of 
    PCR-GLOBWB may not be available in the here downloadable version.
    If you encounter any issues, please contact the developers!
